mission: David Ben-Gurion founding Israel with Marvel superhero powers

script_processing.original_script: [VISUAL: Dynamic shot of Ben-Gurion with glowing eyes and a cape.] DIALOGUE: Behold! David Ben-Gurion, Israel's founding father, wields powers beyond mortal comprehension. [VISUAL: Ben-Gurion uses telekinesis to assemble blueprints.] DIALOGUE: With the might of a cosmic titan, he marshals resources, shaping a nation from pure will. [VISUAL: Ben-Gurion projects force fields protecting early settlers.] DIALOGUE: Facing impossible odds, his amplified strength shielded his people from every threat. [VISUAL: Ben-Gurion soaring above the land, a beacon of hope.] DIALOGUE: His unwavering vision, powered by an ancestral energy, illuminated the path forward. [VISUAL: Ben-Gurion striking a heroic pose with the Israeli flag.] DIALOGUE: Thus, with super-powered resolve, David Ben-Gurion founded Israel, a legend reborn.
script_processing.final_script: Behold David Ben-Gurion, Israel's founding father. He wielded immense power, shaping a nation from sheer will. Facing insurmountable odds, his strength protected his people. His unwavering vision, fueled by ancestral energy, illuminated the path. With super-powered resolve, he founded Israel, a legend reborn. His leadership was a beacon of hope, guiding his nation through turbulent times. The impossible became possible under his determined gaze. He inspired generations with his courage and conviction. Ben-Gurion's legacy continues to inspire. He remains a symbol of unwavering determination. His impact is felt even today. A true giant among men
